resources.string: Manpages allows to display GNU/Linux manual pages. Each page has its own license (often the GNU FDL).
Application developed by Julien Guepin. This is free software licensed under the BSD license.
You should download manual pages on your phone to be able to read it without internet connection. 23MB will be stored on your SD card or internal storage. Do you agree ?
Those commands that can be executed by the user from within a shell.
Those functions which must be performed by the kernel.
The format for /etc/passwd and other human-readable files.
Overviews of various topics, conventions and protocols, character set standards, and miscellaneous other things.
Commands like mount(8), many of which only root can execute.
